title: Heat Conference and ADE Awards Dinner 2015
desc: Your personal information will be held and used in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998.? SE2 Ltd, the Event Managers, are a data controller under the Data Protection Register.? Your information will be used by the Event Managers only for the purposes of the Heat Conference 2015.? When you book, you will be able to opt in to receiving further information from the ADE and the EI. Your information will be stored securely on the registrations database, hosted by Eventbrite: their privacy policy is available  .
